name: I am Root!
description:
Tree growing game in which you control a root traversing deeper and deeper through an (almost) action packed soil to provide for the tree. This is our third Ludum Dare and our second finished game. Hope you have fun! :D 

How to play:

You need water to keep going and some nutritious fungi to grow the tree. Avoid obstacles to not lose water and keep the growing going. 

  • [←/→] or [A/D] to Move
  • [↑] or [W] to Slow down
  • [↓] or [S] to Speed up

Music:
Odyssey by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4995-odyssey
